title: Policy actions in a severe recession

content.question: If the economy is in a severe recession, which of the following policy actions is most appropriate?

choices.label: Keeping administered interest rates constant and reducing budget deficits
Decreasing government spending and taxes by the same amount
Increasing government spending and decreasing administered interest rates
Increasing both administered interest rates and taxes
Decreasing government transfer payments and increasing taxes

content.answer: Increasing government spending and decreasing administered interest rates

topic.text: 5.1: Fiscal and Monetary Policy Actions in the Short Run
